input.sentences: the lighthouse stood tall and majestic .
they wished they were allowed inside .
the rickety | old fence showed it age .
the winds had taken a toll .
still | you could n't hope to see a prettier sunset .
output.sentences: The majestic light tower attracts many visitors.
Before people go inside they post selfies.
People of all ages are attracted to ocean fixtures.
Even broken fences that the wind has taken a toll on.
And nothing beats a sunset at the beach
